targets.query: SELECT (mean("cache_hit")  / (mean("cache_hit") + mean("cache_miss"))) * 100 AS hit_ratio FROM "varnish_statistics" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT (mean("cache_hit")  / (mean("cache_hit") + mean("cache_miss"))) * 100 AS hit_rate FROM "varnish_statistics" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "varnish" WITH KEY = "host"
